topic.title: 휴가 중 이웃에게 식물 물주기 부탁하기
topic.description: 장기간 집을 비울 때 이웃에게 식물에 물을 주는 것과 같은 작은 부탁을 하는 상황의 대화입니다.

korean_scripts.korean_text: 아, 지혜 씨! 안녕하세요. 어디 가세요?
저희 다음 주에 가족 여행을 가거든요. 부탁할 게 하나 있는데, 혹시 시간 괜찮으세요?
혹시 괜찮으시다면, 저희 휴가 간 동안 식물에 물 좀 주실 수 있을까요?
물론이죠! 기꺼이 도와드릴게요. 식물은 어디에 있나요?
거실 창가에 있어요. 이틀에 한 번만 주시면 돼요. 정말 감사합니다!
별말씀을요. 걱정 말고 여행 잘 다녀오세요!

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Oh, Jihye! Hello. Are you going somewhere?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Oh, Jihye! | Hello. || Are you going somewhere?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: We're going on a family trip next week. **I have a favor to ask**, if you have a moment.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: We're going on a family trip | next week. || **I have a favor to ask**, | if you have a moment.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Yes, of course. What is it?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Yes, | of course. || What is it?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: If you don't mind, could you **water our plants** while we're on vacation?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: If you don't mind, | could you **water our plants** | while we're on vacation?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Of course! I'd be happy to help. Where are the plants?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Of course! || I'd be happy to help. | Where are the plants?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: They're by the living room window. You just need to water them **once every two days**. Thank you so much!
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: They're by the living room window. || You just need to water them | **once every two days**. || Thank you so much!

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Don't mention it. Have a great trip without any worries!
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Don't mention it. || Have a great trip | without any worries!
